h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
content: It’s when you kill the King that you’ll really have to start worrying. He’ll power up with blasts of wind as his mace glows hot, and will now imbue his strikes with fissures that erupt all around the impact site of his weapon!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince'.
The content is as follows:
It’s when you kill the King that you’ll really have to start worrying. He’ll power up with blasts of wind as his mace glows hot, and will now imbue his strikes with fissures that erupt all around the impact site of his weapon!
